With notes of Sicilian lemon, pink berries, and peony accord, this vegan perfume is both feminine and bold. Plus, it's paraben-free, sulfate-free, phthalate-free, and silicone-free, making it a responsible choice for the environmentally-conscious shopper. SOFT + SUPPLE GISELE FABRIC: A blend of buttery soft and cool to the touch 95% modal jersey. DURABLE + COZY: Made with high quality fabric that won't crease or shrink and will hug your body even after extended wear. CUTE + CLASSIC: Look put together in a matching shirt and pant set with contrasting piping is a timeless classic look. LIVE A WELL-RESTED LIFE: Stay grounded at home and in nature. A life inspired by doing good and feeling good. CONSCIOUSLY CRAFT: Lenzing Modal creates sustainable fabric for a luxurious and guilt free sleep. Contrast piping. Pajama pant has a lower rise and relaxed leg. 95% modal, 5% spandex. Machine wash cold with like colors, only non-chlorine bleach when needed, lay flat to dry, do not iron. Made in Peru. Mesh boned bodice and tiered tulle skirt. Adjustable shoulder straps. Hidden back zipper closure. BCB-WD758. MT02D17. Founded in 1989, BCBGMAXAZRIA is the vision of one man: founder, designer, chairman and CEO Max Azria. Named for the French phrase bon chic, bon genre, a Parisian slang meaning good style, good attitude, the brand embodies a true combination of European sophistication and American spirit. The collection is a resulting line of directional, sophisticated designs in the most luxurious fabrics. Celebrities such as Angelina Jolie, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Rachel Bilson and Eva Mendes amongst many others, are huge fans of the brand.

products.brandedName: DANIELLE FRANKEL Lou Off-the-shoulder Cotton-blend Poplin Gown - Ivory
products.unbrandedName: Lou Off-the-shoulder Cotton-blend Poplin Gown - Ivory
products.description: EXCLUSIVE AT NET-A-PORTER.COM. When it came time for Danielle Frankel to design her own wedding dress, she took inspiration from her fiancé's shirts and a vintage trench coat to create a piece that was completely unique - the 'Lou' gown was born. Cut to sit effortlessly off-the-shoulder, this cotton-blend poplin style has a waist-defining belt and discreet pockets to store a cell phone so you can take selfies throughout the night. The dramatic hem has a quilted trim to hold its shape and is strategically cut shorter at the front, preventing any missteps when walking down the aisle. Shown here with: [The Row Tote id1061201], [Gianvito Rossi Sandals id1049387], [Valentino Earrings id1084680].

ABOUT THE BRAND Designer Manuel Blahnik Rodríguez was studying art and set design in Paris in 1969 when notable fashion editor Diana Vreeland encouraged him to design shoes after seeing his sketches. His luxury shoe brand combines glamour and sophistication, and is best known for producing attention-grabbing pumps. Women's Shoes - M Blahnik Womens Shoes > Manolo Blahnik > Saks Fifth Avenue > Barneys. Manolo Blahnik. Color: Cobalt Blue. Size: 11.

products.description: Introducing the Michael Stars Sylvia Jogger, a stylish and comfortable loungewear essential for women. This jogger in camel features dual front angled pockets, a back right pocket, ribbed cuffs, and an elasticized drawstring waistband for the perfect fit.
